name: Dodge
text: Damage you take is reduced by your LUCK until your next turn

name: Block
text: Physical Damage you take is reduced by half until your next turn

name: Mage Armor
text: Damage you take is reduced by 1 for your next 2 turns

name: Cleave
text: Deal W damage to each adjacent enemy.

name: Sabotage
text: The next time target enemy would take a major action they take it against themselves instead

name: Second Wind
text: Target ally shuffles their graveyard into their library and gains 5 hp

name: Magic Missile
text: Up to two target enemies take 5 magic damage

name: Taunt
text: Adjacent enemies can't use major actions next turn unless they target you

name: Assassinate
text: Deal 7 damage to target enemy. Damage that you take is increased by 1 until your next turn.

name: Shifting Earth
text: Change the row of up to 3 targets.

name: Duel
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent target. Until your next turn
column7: that target can't take actions unless they target you.

name: Poison
text: Target enemy takes 4 poison damage at the beginning of each of their turns. At the end of each of their turns
column7: they can make a physique save to cure this.

name: Sunburst
text: Deal 3 holy damage to each enemy.

name: Blinding Spray
text: Up to 3 enemies attack as if their opponents are dodging until your next turn.

name: Surge
text: Regain 5 life. Until your next turn
column7: reduce damage dealt to you by 2.

name: Sunder
text: Reduce target's damage resistance by 5. It can't go lower than 0.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 5 fire damage to target enemy
column7: and each enemy adjacent to them.
